item.description:
"At Grezzo, we are committed to bringing you flawlessly fresh food with its life force still intact. The concept is green, organic and locally grown vegan, raw food served in an upscale style and setting. Our menu changes daily and reflects the availability of organic, high quality, living foods.

Grezzo Restaurant is located in the heart of Boston's historic North End. This elegant, upscale restaurant serves food that is a virtual explosion of taste and a feast for the eyes. Set in rustic tones, the 28-seat candlelit restaurant with copper tables and crushed cranberry colored chairs specializes in Organic, Raw Vegan cuisine.

At Grezzo (pronounced Gray-Zo, meaning raw in Italian) every dish is 100% Organic except when an ingredient is not available as an organic product.

Raw and Living Food refers to foods that are kept below 112 degrees. Because we are a vegan raw and living food restaurant, we use fresh, seasonal fruits, vegetables, nuts and seeds as the entire concept for our distinctive gourmet cuisine." www.GrezzoRestaurant.com

Grezzo is conveniently near a parking garage and subway stops.

Please ask to be seated with Meetup, introduce yourself to the group, and enjoy!

Please order owner, renowned chef, and author, Alissa Cohen's book and/or DVD here: http://www.alissacohe... Thank you!









posted by www.essenic.org
item.how_to_find_us: Please ask to be seated with Meetup, introduce yourself to the group, and enjoy!
item.name: Grezzo Restaurant (4th_Sat.)
